ingredients.ingredient: ½ (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened
1 (4 ounce) package crumbled feta cheese, or to taste
⅓ cup frozen chopped spinach - thawed, drained, and squeezed dry
2 stalks scallions, white and green parts, thinly sliced
1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed

cookingTips: Squeeze spinach thoroughly to remove excess moisture which prevents sogginess
Create a pocket in salmon fillet by slicing horizontally, being careful not to cut through sides
Use a meat thermometer to ensure salmon reaches 145°F internally
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user prepare an elegant, restaurant-quality stuffed salmon fillet with creamy feta and spinach filling.
